column1: Agaldor was the chieftain of a people living in the northwest of Middle-earth.

Agaldor was a Men living among the exiled people in Middle-earth. He was the chief of a people on the edge of the Belegaer and a seer who often walked along the beaches and coastlines. He foresaw among other things
column2: the arrival of the Númenóreans and the redemption of mankind ahead. Agaldor was later killed by the Númenóreans who took control of the lands.
